item.description:

thanlk you but how i fix if i click on lumbridge tele or on trollheim tele it shuts down the server and if i restart it it shut downs everytime again how i fix it??? how i change the coords where my account stays?

item.source: Making myself admin on 503 server and fixing a bug!

item.title: Making myself admin on 503 server and fixing a bug!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Go into the packets folder, and then into the playerLogin class. Then search for p.rights.
You’ll see something like this;

if (p.username.equals("jord")) { p.rights = 2; }
Change the user name in the “” to your name.

Read full topic
item.source: Making myself admin on 503 server and fixing a bug!
